name: Stone (itch) (Elvendwarf)
description:
This is the game that I have made with all my love for the competition, 
it may not be the best but the important thing is to participate, 
I invite you to try it and write comments. Good luck and thanks.

Controls:
Mouse: Turn the character

WASD: Move

Click: Shoot

Shift: Bomb

Esc: Pause

F7: GodMode
